articles.description: House of the Dragon’s co-showrunner Miguel Sapochnik is parting with the show just as it’s beginning to take off, but he doesn’t plan on leaving HBO just yet.

Spochniks exit comes just as hes signed a new first-look deal with HBO
Photo by CHRIS DELMAS / AFP via Getty Images
Though House of the Dragonreportedly gave HBO its biggest premiere of all time an… [+1246 chars]
